segments.text: Excuse me , how do I get to Wall Street ?
segments.speaker: S1

segments.text: Take the A train south to the Liberty Ave . stop . You should be able to find it from there .
segments.speaker: S2

segments.text: I ’ m sorry , but how do I know the subway train is going south ?
segments.speaker: S1

segments.text: The southbound A trains say Brooklyn .
segments.speaker: S2

segments.text: O . K . , so it ’ s this one ?
segments.speaker: S1

segments.text: Yeah . Hey ? What are you doing ? Let the people off the train before you get on .
segments.speaker: S2
